name: Creating Game Ready Animations With the use of motion Capture
name_original: Creating Game Ready Animations With the use of motion Capture
description:
Here is my submission for the Grads in games Search For A Star animation Category. I utilised Motion capture for my submission as that's where I hope to be focusing my career.

During my project I focus on the whole motion capture workflow from capturing the data, Retargeting, cleaning them up to be game ready animations before finally implementing them into ue4. 

I also choose to Use the new MetaHumans With the hopes that I can take my work and create an animation pack to be uploaded onto the Unreal Engine marketplaces so that other users will be able to use my animation will any and all Metahumans.
